constantValues: Organizational knowledge for internal and external use.

members.name: knowledgearticleId

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: stateCode

constantValues: Shows whether the article is a draft or is published, archived, or discarded. Draft articles aren't available externally and can be edited. Published articles are available externally, based on applicable permissions, but can't be edited. All metadata changes are reflected in the published version. Archived and discarded articles aren't available externally and can't be edited.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'KnowledgeArticle' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.description: Shows whether the article is a draft or is published, archived, or discarded. Draft articles aren't available externally and can be edited. Published articles are available externally, based on applicable permissions, but can't be edited. All metadata changes are reflected in the published version. Archived and discarded articles aren't available externally and can't be edited.

members.description: Select the article's status.
